languages.text: {n}Маражай раздраженно щелкает языком.{/n} "Я потратил немало сил для того, чтобы порадовать тебя... и так ты отплачиваешь мне за мои труды? Хм. Будь по-твоему. Возможно, твой вкус все еще слишком... банален, чтобы сполна оценить то, что тебе было предложено".

{n}Marazhai clicks his tongue in vexation.{/n} "I have taken great pains to gratify you... and this is how you repay me for my labours? Hmm. Have it your way. Perhaps your palate is still too... bland to fully appreciate what has been offered to you."
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай раздраженно щелкает языком.{/n} "Я потратил немало сил для того, чтобы порадовать тебя... и так ты отплачиваешь мне за мои труды? Хм. Будь по-твоему. Возможно, твой вкус все еще слишком... банален, чтобы сполна оценить то, что тебе было предложено".

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋恼怒地啧着舌。{/n}“我费尽心思想要满足你……可你就是这样答复我的吗？嗯，随便你吧。或许你的口味还是……太寡淡了，无法充分品尝我给你的礼物。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue in vexation.{/n} "I have taken great pains to gratify you... and this is how you repay me for my labours? Hmm. Have it your way. Perhaps your palate is still too... bland to fully appreciate what has been offered to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋恼怒地啧着舌。{/n}“我费尽心思想要满足你……可你就是这样答复我的吗？嗯，随便你吧。或许你的口味还是……太寡淡了，无法充分品尝我给你的礼物。”

languages.text: {n}マラズハイが苛立って舌打ちする。{/n}「感謝したくて随分と苦労したんだぞ…これがその労力に対する仕打ちか？ふん、好きにしたらいい。お前の趣向はまだ…面白みがなくて、目の前に出されたものの良さが十分に分からないんだな」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue in vexation.{/n} "I have taken great pains to gratify you... and this is how you repay me for my labours? Hmm. Have it your way. Perhaps your palate is still too... bland to fully appreciate what has been offered to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイが苛立って舌打ちする。{/n}「感謝したくて随分と苦労したんだぞ…これがその労力に対する仕打ちか？ふん、好きにしたらいい。お前の趣向はまだ…面白みがなくて、目の前に出されたものの良さが十分に分からないんだな」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai chasquea la lengua, irritado.{/n} «Me he tomado indecibles molestias para satisfacerte... ¿y así es como me lo pagas? Hum. Tú verás. Puede que tu paladar aún sea demasiado... vulgar para apreciar plenamente lo que se te ha ofrecido».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue in vexation.{/n} "I have taken great pains to gratify you... and this is how you repay me for my labours? Hmm. Have it your way. Perhaps your palate is still too... bland to fully appreciate what has been offered to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai chasquea la lengua, irritado.{/n} «Me he tomado indecibles molestias para satisfacerte... ¿y así es como me lo pagas? Hum. Tú verás. Puede que tu paladar aún sea demasiado... vulgar para apreciar plenamente lo que se te ha ofrecido».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai fait claquer sa langue d'un air vexé.{/n} « Je me suis donné un mal fou pour vous faire plaisir... et c'est ainsi que vous me remerciez ? Hmm. Comme vous voudrez. Peut-être votre palais n'est-il pas encore assez exercé pour apprécier pleinement ce qui vous est offert. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue in vexation.{/n} "I have taken great pains to gratify you... and this is how you repay me for my labours? Hmm. Have it your way. Perhaps your palate is still too... bland to fully appreciate what has been offered to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai fait claquer sa langue d'un air vexé.{/n} « Je me suis donné un mal fou pour vous faire plaisir... et c'est ainsi que vous me remerciez ? Hmm. Comme vous voudrez. Peut-être votre palais n'est-il pas encore assez exercé pour apprécier pleinement ce qui vous est offert. »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt voller Verdruss mit der Zunge.{/n} "Ich habe große Mühen auf mich genommen, um Euch zu erfreuen ... und so dankt Ihr mir? Hmm. Wie Ihr wollt. Vielleicht ist Euer Gaumen noch zu ... unterentwickelt, um das Euch Gebotene im vollem Umfang schätzen zu wissen."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue in vexation.{/n} "I have taken great pains to gratify you... and this is how you repay me for my labours? Hmm. Have it your way. Perhaps your palate is still too... bland to fully appreciate what has been offered to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai schnalzt voller Verdruss mit der Zunge.{/n} "Ich habe große Mühen auf mich genommen, um Euch zu erfreuen ... und so dankt Ihr mir? Hmm. Wie Ihr wollt. Vielleicht ist Euer Gaumen noch zu ... unterentwickelt, um das Euch Gebotene im vollem Umfang schätzen zu wissen."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, sinirle dilini şıklatıyor.{/n} "Seni memnun etmek için büyük acılara katlandım ve... Çabalarımın karşılığını böyle mi veriyorsun? Hımm. İstediğin gibi olsun. Belki de hâlâ... Sana sunulanlara minnet duyamayacak kadar ağzının tadını bilmiyorsundur."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai clicks his tongue in vexation.{/n} "I have taken great pains to gratify you... and this is how you repay me for my labours? Hmm. Have it your way. Perhaps your palate is still too... bland to fully appreciate what has been offered to you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai, sinirle dilini şıklatıyor.{/n} "Seni memnun etmek için büyük acılara katlandım ve... Çabalarımın karşılığını böyle mi veriyorsun? Hımm. İstediğin gibi olsun. Belki de hâlâ... Sana sunulanlara minnet duyamayacak kadar ağzının tadını bilmiyorsundur."
